issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
We removed login from the Titanium CLI and replaced most operations with a NOOP. However, the {{status}} command does not work anymore and scripts like [grunt-titanium|https://github.com/tonylukasavage/grunt-titanium/blob/master/tasks/titanium.js#L302-L312] that rely on it don't work as a result of that.

The {{status}} command should be a NOOP as well and return a result as if logged in to make sure scripts that depend on it continue to work.
fields.summary: status-command no longer works since we removed login

comments.body: The status command has been deprecated. It has been removed in the next Ti CLI.
